Laws which apply in the workplace, in relationships, in the street or watching the evening news: everything, everyone and to achieve any purpose.

This version includes 48 laws and its short summary.

Features
 
LAWS LIST
You can see all laws with its corresponding title, ordered as they appear in the book.

LAWS DESCRIPTION
Each law contains its short summary, a brief explanation of why it is important to apply the principle

SHARE LAW
There is a functionality for sharing law, whom you feel is necessary, who see that you need, in your Facebook wall or wherever you want.

NOTIFICATIONS
In the second section you can manage the appearance of a daily notification with the title of the current law. Once you allow notifications, from the day that enabled them in the following 48 days you will see a different law, every day. Tapping in the notification, you can access the app and view its description.

LAWS SEARCH
In the latest version we include search functionality, both in the title of the law and in its description. Thus, if you remember a concept that you want to reinforce but do not remember the location or number of the law, you can find it easily.

SEEN AND LAST SEEN LAWS
We also include the state of the laws you have read and which law was the last seen. Therefore, if you have not finished reading a law, you can easily locate it.

Thank you very much for downloading 48 Laws of Power.

For better communication, you can also send us an email with your suggestions, questions or anything you want to todoappsarg@gmail.com

ShowFm.net创建于2003年，由一班来自广东，热爱网络、热爱生活的年轻人共同打造。ShowFm.net的宗旨，是希望为广大网友提供一个免费的网络文化互动空间，并以广东本土文化为切入点，打造特色内容，建立起一个文化交流的友好平台。ShowFm.net实际为“Show For Me”（也有朋友简称为“SFM”）的缩写，意思是鼓励大家能够在这个互动空间里展现自我。

ShowFm.net立志于成为综合性网络文化互动交流平台。我们从不同角度入手，引导用户参与，积极分享各类文化产物的作品，作为学习、交流的对象。

ShowFm.net，自建立至今，已有8年之久。八年的时间里，每一年，对于ShowFm.net来说，都是一个关卡！因为ShowFm.net作为一个个人性的非盈利网站，在没有任何商业收入的情况下，我们的服务器空间等硬件、软件条件都需要承担。有朋友提出服务器下载的速度等问题，但就下载服务器而言，一年的支出就需近万元，这些都是靠听众及身边朋友的支持下才能提供自主的服务器，供各位听众朋友进行下载。平常一些活动、奖品和网站维护费用，均由网站团队支出。但即使困难再多ShowFM.net还是没有放弃，继续坚持将网站更完善，这些幕后的精神也是“Show For Me”的精髓，大家都在努力！

ShowFm.net创新性地以粤语评书（俗称“讲古”）为主线发展，我们当中的网络讲古（简称“NT”）成员，是一群来自于社会各领域，各阶层，各年龄层次，且热爱岭南文化，对阅读拥有浓厚兴趣的人群，更乐于与他人分享。结合网络小说，现已推出了多部“讲古”作品，如《盗墓笔记》、《史上第一混乱》、《鬼吹灯》、《枪王》等等，更是获得广大网友的追捧和喜爱。

在2012年，ShowFm.net继续坚持自己的梦想与宗旨，推出全新网页改版，在保留原来的热门内容之余，将开拓出更多层面的内容，鼓励更多的原创团队进驻。我们相信，凭借我们的热情和执着，我们一定能将ShowFm.net打造成华南地区最优秀的个人网络文化交流平台。

summary.label:
Holy Bible in Filipino or Tagalog Bible.
Tagalog Bible has got all chapter of Old Testament and New Testament.

The Filipino language, based on the Tagalog language (the major dialect), is national language of the Philippines. The Christian Bible has been translated into numerous Philippine languages.

Portions of the Sacred Scriptures were first translated by the Spanish friars into the Philippine languages in the catechisms they published, and the prayer materials they produced. A fine example would be the "Pater Noster" in Tagalog Baybayin Script in the first book published (by xylography) in the Philippines, the Doctrina Cristiana (1593).

Protestants published 'Ang Biblia' in 1905 in Tagalog, according to the Protestant canon. Translators based their work on a Spanish version.

Msgr. Jose C. Abriol, Filipino Catholic priest, translated from Hebrew and Greek into Tagalog.

Most Protestant denominations use the New International Version of the Bible (now on Filipino version), owing to the fact that English is also the official language of the Philippines. Nonetheless, most Mainline Protestant denominations in the Philippines tend to prefer the Magandang Balita Biblia (Good News Bible). The Iglesia ni Cristo also uses the same translation.

Jehovah's Witnesses or Mga Saksi ni Jehova uses their own version of Bible called New World Translation that is published in Filipino languages Tagalog, Cebuano, Hiligaynon and other 100+ languages since 1980's.

Pathian khawngaihna leh malsawmna avangin Bible bu chi dang, mobile phone a dah luh theih leh chhiar theih chiin Mizo King James Bible chu peih a lo ni ta reng mai. A duh apiangten a free in an mobile-ah an dah lut ang a, an kalna apiangah an mobile phone hmangin he King James Bible hi inkhawmna hmunah emaw, ramhnuaiah te leh khawi ilo kal chhuahna apiangah an keng zel thei tawh dawn a ni a. Hetiang buatsaih thei tura Pathian khawngaihna ka chang hi a lawmawm hle mai.

King James (Old) leh New King James Version behchhana Mizo Bible buatsaih hna hi a namai lo hle mai a. Hman laia Europe rama letlingtu hmasate tuar ang thihna leh martarna êm chu kan tuar ve lo ve; a kawng erawh chu a lo bumboh zia a taka dai chhuah a ngai ve hle mai.

He Bible Apps buatsaihnaa sensote chu Australia rama Melbourne khawpui, Victoria Mizo Kohhran (VMK) ten sum lama min rawn tumsak (sponsor) a, chuvangin a duh apiangte tan he Bible Apps hi a free a hman theih turin kan siam theih phah a, anni VMK chungah pawh lawmthu ka sawi a ni. He Bible project hi a bul aṭanga a tawp thlengin, mite kuta a awm hnu thleng pawhin Lalpa Pathianin a Thlarauvin nunga a awmpui zel chauhvin Pathian thu nung leh mite nun khawih danglam theitu a ni dawn a; chutiang tur chuan he Bible Apps – Mizo King James Bible hi Lalpa ropui nan leh a Lalram zau zel nan kan hlan a ni.

Upa Dr P.C. Biaksiama,

Kum 11 chhung hian vawi li lai he Bible hian ennawnna a lo paltlang tawh a; ulukna hian chin tawk a neih loh avang leh Mizo ṭawng ziah dan chi thar te a lo chhuah ṭhin avangin ennawn apiangin siamṭhat zeuh zeuh a ngai ziah bawk a. Tun tum edition pawh hian 2017-a mi kha hmun ṭhenkhatah chuan ennawnna hnuhma a lang zeuh zeuh dawn a; lehlinna thumal leh ṭawngkam thlak danglam zeuh te pawh a awm thei a; he Bible ngainatute leh chîk taka lo chhiartuten in lo hriatthiamna ka ngen a ni. Kum sawm hmêl hmu chauh, Bible naupang tak a la nih avangin loh theih loh a ni ve bawk; a aia kum tam taka upa zawk te pawhin ennawna tihdanglam an la tawk ve fo tho a ni.
